summary: This document contains financial transaction details including incoming and outgoing wires, checks, and ACH reports dated February 16, 2018. It lists various transactions involving Deutsche Bank and other financial entities, detailing amounts, beneficiaries, and account information.

keyFacts: The document details financial transactions including incoming and outgoing wires and checks.
Ryan A. Dermas is identified as a beneficiary of a financial transaction.
Stephen A. Fromm and Laura Z. Fromm are also identified as beneficiaries in a transaction.
The transactions involve various amounts and are associated with Deutsche Bank and JPMorgan Chase Bank.
The document is marked confidential under Federal Rule of Criminal Procedure.
